title: The Boy in the Smoke
description: On a cold night, Stephen Dene went to the Eton boathouse to perform a desperate act. But someone stopped him along the way, sending his life in a new and decidedly strange directionâ€“leading him to London, to two new friends, and to a world of shadows and mystery.Released for free on WattpadSection one: August 18thSection two: August 25thSection three: September 1stSection four: September 8th
